T02D1479:122a-1: shr'i tsakra samba ra mandala mam ga la g'a th'a ;
T02D1479:122a-3: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
T02D1479:122a-4: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1479:122a-5: bkra shis gang zhig chos kyi dbyings las nges byung zhing //
T02D1479:122a-6: he ru ka dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po 'bar pa'i sku //
T02D1479:122a-7: shes rab phag mo'i padmor rdo rje rol mdzad pa'i //
T02D1479:122a-8: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:122a-9: shog / bkra shis gang zhig phyogs kyi padmo'i 'dab
T02D1479:122a-10: ma la // rigs kyi yum bzhi dpa' bo'i phyogs bzhi'i zhal la gzigs //
T02D1479:122a-11: padmo mu khyud gri gug phreng bas rnam par mdzes//
T02D1479:122b-0: @122b bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra
T02D1479:122b-1: shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig mtshams kyi padmo'i
T02D1479:122b-2: 'dab ma la // byang chub sems dang tsandan dri chen gur kum chus //
T02D1479:122b-3: gang ba'i snod bzhi dpa' bo'i zhal la reg par mdzod //
T02D1479:122b-4: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog ;
T02D1479:122b-5: / bkra shis gang zhig nam mkha'i gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
T02D1479:122b-6: 'khor lo sngon po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud rdo rje phreng //
T02D1479:122b-7: gnas la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
T02D1479:122b-8: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:122b-9: shog / bkra shis gang zhig sa stengs gnas nas
T02D1479:122b-10: legs spyod pa'i // 'khor lo dmar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud padmo'i phreng //
T02D1479:122b-11: zhing la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
T02D1479:122b-12: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:122b-13: shog / bkra shis gang zhig sa 'og gnas nas
T02D1479:122b-14: legs spyod pa'i // 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud 'khor lo'i phreng //
T02D1479:122b-15: 'du la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
T02D1479:122b-16: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:122b-17: shog / bkra shis gang zhig dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi
T02D1479:122b-18: mtshams rnams su // khva gdong la sogs ma mo yid 'phrog gzugs gnyis ldan //
T02D1479:122b-19: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad gdug pa kun 'dul ba'i //
T02D1479:122b-20: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:122b-21: shog / bkra shis gang zhig dran pa nyer gzhag
T02D1479:122b-22: bzhi rnams dang // yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang po stobs //
T02D1479:122b-23: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02D1479:122b-24: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:122b-25: shog / bkra shis gang zhig rin chen pha gus
T02D1479:122b-27: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ni rab tu brgyan gyur pa'i //
T02D1479:122b-28: mu tig phreng ba gser gyi dril bu rnga yab legs dpyangs 'phyar //
T02D1479:122b-29: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:122b-30: shog / bkra shis gang zhig rta babs padma chos
T02D1479:122b-32: mdzes pa'i ri dags dang bcas ba dan bcu drug legs 'phyar zhing //
T02D1479:123a-0: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu dag @123a * //
T02D1479:123a-2: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:123a-3: shog / bkra shis gang zhig yongs su bskor ba'i
T02D1479:123a-5: phyogs skyong shing chen mchod rten brgyad ni gnas pa la //
T02D1479:123a-6: gdong brnyan ldan zhing zhing skyong brgyad ni kun nas gnas gyur pa //
T02D1479:123a-7: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis
T02D1479:123a-8: shog / bkra shis gang zhig ye shes me brgyad
T02D1479:123a-10: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sprin chen brgyad ni 'dus gyur pa //
T02D1479:123a-11: dga' po la sogs klu chen brgyad rnams kun nas gnas gyur pa //
T02D1479:123a-12: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi
T02D1479:123a-13: bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig thugs rje'i
T02D1479:123a-14: rang bzhin chu chen brgyad 'bab cing //
T02D1479:123a-15: dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis gang //
T02D1479:123a-16: 'dre dang sha za gnod sbyin 'byung po nye bar bsten pa yi //
T02D1479:123a-17: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi
T02D1479:123a-18: bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rdo rje'i
T02D1479:123a-20: rdo rje bla bres kun nas bres shing mda' yi ra bar ldan //
T02D1479:123a-21: ye shes me ri phreng bas kun nas yongs bskor ba'i //
T02D1479:123a-22: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi
T02D1479:123a-23: bkra shis shog / dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi
T02D1479:123a-24: bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
T02D1479:123a-25: kha che'i yul du byung zhing dngos grub brnyes pa'i
T02D1479:123a-26: slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1479:123a-28: / // / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o //
